Name: Spirit Frenzy
Desc:
Opens a passageway for spirits to pass through, creating a barrier.
Spirit Frenzy does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job skill, Deepen Communion.

Desc.Old:
Opens a passageway for spirits to pass through, creating a barrier.
Spirit Frenzy absorbs the souls of enemies that fail to pass through, increasing its duration. Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job skill, Deepen Communion.
Desc.New:
Opens a passageway for spirits to pass through, creating a barrier.
Spirit Frenzy does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 4th Job skill, Deepen Communion.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 30. Summons a barrier for 45 sec. This barrier periodically
attacks up to 10 enemies at 210% DAMAGE 6 times.
Duration +1 sec per Spirit Frenzy kill, up to 15 sec
Cooldown: 30 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 30. Summons a Spirit Frenzy for 60 sec.
The barrier periodically attacks up to 10 enemies at 210% Damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 30 sec.

Cooldown: 30 sec
